data.title: SEIBU 1 Day Pass
data.text:
Things to note

Please bring your passport OR foreign resident card to claim your pass.

Please present your voucher to the staff when you exchange the ticket.

Important information

Tickets must be picked up at SEIBU Tourist Information Center Ikebukuro in Ikebukuro Station (see schedule for location details).

Please show the ticket to station staff to pass through the ticket gate.

Validity period: Valid for 2 weeks from the date of exchange. (The validity period will be stamped on the ticket at the time of exchange. )

Cancellation policy

This voucher can be full refunded before exchange.

It can’t be refunded or cancelled if the voucher’s expired.

Restrictions

Users of this pass cannot be Japanese citizens. Presenting your passport or resident card is required when picking up your ticket.

Know before you book

Please note that use of the Tamagawa Line is not included in this pass.

Please note that to use the Limited Express, you must pay a surcharge. Use of the Limited Express is not included in this pass.

Please buy 2 tickets if you plan to use a pass for 2 days.

Booking deadline

You don't need to specify a participation date.

Available dates

You don't need to specify a participation date.

【What to keep in mind when purchasing Japan Boost Travel】

・Please check the issuance lead time and conditions listed on the price plan and purchase well in advance of your departure date.

・By making a purchase through the Service, you are signifying your agreement to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
